last_episode_to_air.name: The Witching Hour (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Agatha tricks most of Cackle’s into a world of magical landfill, it looks like her victims are all set to be recycled and disappear for ever at midnight, unless Mildred can save the day before the fateful hour!

name: The Worst Witch
overview: Mayhem and mishaps follow young witch Mildred Hubble wherever she goes. She just can't help it! But with her friends' help, Mildred always manages to avoid disaster just in time.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Mildred Hubble's first year at Cackle's Academy is filled with potions, spells and broomsticks -- and one disaster after the next.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: A second year at Cackle's Academy means double the magic and mischief for accident-prone witch in training Mildred Hubble and her friends.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Armed with newfound confidence, Mildred returns to Cackle's Academy, where her mother is joining the staff as the school's first nonmagical teacher.

episodes.name: Selection Day Part 1
episodes.overview: Mildred Hubble's world changes when a witch crashes into her balcony. She visits Cackle's Academy where she is amazed by everything - the magic, the potions, and that every student gets their own cat.

episodes.name: Selection Day Part 2
episodes.overview: After she visits Cackle's Academy with her new witch friend Maud Spellbody, Mildred attempts to enrol by taking the magical exam.

episodes.name: Tabby
episodes.overview: Mildred learns that having a scaredy cat makes life at witching school tough - especially when Ethel Hallow is determined to see her fail.

episodes.name: New Girl
episodes.overview: Everyone's excited at the arrival of Enid, a young witch from the famous Nightshade family. Enid sees that Mildred is the local unwitting troublemaker and immediately latches onto her - it's the last thing Mildred needs.

episodes.name: Pond Life
episodes.overview: Mildred is having fun jumping high into the air with Enid, using pirated magic to make the grass bouncy. Maud is getting fed up with Enid constantly distracting Mildred - Maud knows Mildred needs to knuckle down if she's going to stand a chance at the academy and can't bear the thought of losing her.

episodes.name: The Great Wizard's Visit
episodes.overview: Miss Cackle isn't herself when the Great Wizard visits, leaving her job in jeopardy.

episodes.name: The Best Teacher
episodes.overview: Mildred learns not to take shortcuts when a wisdom spell goes wrong.

episodes.name: Maud's Big Mistake
episodes.overview: Maud’s panic about parent’s evening pushes her to use a forgetting powder, meanwhile Mildred wonders if her mum is a witch after all.

episodes.name: The First Witch
episodes.overview: Mildred goes on a hair-raising journey while looking into her magical heritage, meanwhile Ethel thinks she's queen bee when she grows a wart.

episodes.name: Spelling Bee
episodes.overview: There is more than just the Spelling Bee at stake when Miss Hardbroom's rival comes to Cackle's Academy. Meanwhile, Maud and Enid try to help Tabby to catch mice but make things much worse.

episodes.name: The Mists of Time
episodes.overview: Mildred learns about Cackle's history when she and Ethel accidently slip into the Cackle's of the past.

episodes.name: Out of Bounds
episodes.overview: As the end of year exams loom, Miss Cackle’s secret is still weighing heavy on Mildred’s mind.

episodes.name: The Worst Headmistress
episodes.overview: Agatha takes over the school, and without Mildred there, who will save the day?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Mildred Hubble's first year at Cackle's Academy is filled with potions, spells and broomsticks -- and one disaster after the next.

episodes.name: Tortoise Trouble
episodes.overview: It's the first day of term and Mildred stumbles upon something very important.

episodes.name: The Friendship Trap
episodes.overview: Mildred and Ethel are more at odds than ever, so Miss Cackle sets a friendship trap on them, pushing them too close for comfort.

episodes.name: Ethel Everywhere
episodes.overview: Ethel’s clone spell spirals out of control.

episodes.name: The Extraordinary Esper Vespertilio
episodes.overview: Miss Mould helps Mildred with her magic, and Beatrice reveals the source of her sneezing. A famed chantress's biggest fan has an even bigger secret.

episodes.name: Mildred’s Family Tree
episodes.overview: A lesson on family trees gets Mildred thinking about finding her dad. Ethel can’t resist making a cruel joke at Mildred’s expense. Sports Day pushes Maud to take desperate measures.

episodes.name: Bat Girl
episodes.overview: Enid takes a practical joke too far and is threatened with expulsion. Mildred turns herself into a bat but can’t remember how to turn herself back. Clarice struggles to understand the appeal of practical jokes.

episodes.name: Hollow Wood
episodes.overview: Mildred can't understand why the girls are so scared of collecting potions ingredients in the woods until she comes face to face with an unusual creature.

episodes.name: Miss Cackle's Birthday
episodes.overview: Mildred and Enid try to help Maud but accidentally turn her into a baby.

episodes.name: Miss Softbroom
episodes.overview: Miss Cackle goes to find out her fate at the Magic Council.

episodes.name: A New Dawn
episodes.overview: Miss Pentangle teaches modern witching workshops.

episodes.name: Love at First Sight
episodes.overview: Mildred meddles in Miss Bat and Mr Rowan-Webb’s relationship.

episodes.name: All Hollows' Eve (1)
episodes.overview: The girls ask their ancestors for help reigniting the Founding Stone. Meanwhile, at the school Halloween party, magic's misfiring in every direction.

episodes.name: The Big Freeze (2)
episodes.overview: With the academy in crisis -- and her friends trapped in a deep freeze -- Mildred considers a selfless sacrifice to save the day.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: A second year at Cackle's Academy means double the magic and mischief for accident-prone witch in training Mildred Hubble and her friends.

episodes.name: The Wishing Star
episodes.overview: When Miss Cackle refuses Mildred's request to make her mum Julie magical, angry Mildred enters the Great Wizard's broomstick-flying contest. She's determined to win a Wishing Star so she can give Julie magic herself. But Mildred is thwarted by bitter rival Ethel Hallow, and both girls are disqualified - only for Mildred to make a surprising discovery.

episodes.name: Double Hubble
episodes.overview: Some witches are more welcoming than others when Mildred's nonmagical mother, Julie, reports for duty as the school's new art teacher.

episodes.name: Magic Mum
episodes.overview: After turning her mother into a witch, Mildred worries she's made a mistake. Beatrice trains under Miss Tapioca and bakes up a revealing recipe.

episodes.name: The Swamp Troll
episodes.overview: Julie's newfound magic is a little out of control. Elsewhere, Ethel's so full of rage that she turns herself into a Swamp Troll.

episodes.name: The Owl and the Pussycat
episodes.overview: A wise owl holds the key to solving two different problems: Beatrice needs help passing a potions exam, and Maud's cat is slowly disappearing!

episodes.name: The Game
episodes.overview: An addictive new game has the whole school under its spell -- with serious side effects. Meanwhile, students and teachers are going missing.

episodes.name: Bad Magic
episodes.overview: When a guilty Mildred confesses her theft to Miss Hardbroom, it stirs up memories of a fateful friendship -- and a terrible mistake.

episodes.name: The Cackle Run
episodes.overview: Indigo Moon returns to the academy, unaware that 30 years have passed since she turned into stone. Clarice wakes up with a bothersome boil.

episodes.name: Star Struck
episodes.overview: Enid casts a spell on her famous mother so they can spend more time together. Indigo's trying -- but failing -- to fit in, so she runs away.

episodes.name: Finding Joy
episodes.overview: Mildred gets creative to stop Indigo from feeling so sad. Tension brews between Miss Tapioca and her daughter on the day of the Midsummer meal.

episodes.name: The Broomstick Uprising
episodes.overview: Faced with a mess before Indigo's examination, Mildred bewitches a broom -- and sparks a revolution. A mysterious witch comes looking for her dog.

episodes.name: Ethel Hallow to the Rescue (1)
episodes.overview: On the day of Miss Bat's wedding, Mildred and Ethel team up to steal a priceless gift, and Beatrice, Sybil and Clarice bungle an important assignment.

episodes.name: Ethel Hallow to the Rescue (2)
episodes.overview: An unlikely hero steps forward on the last day of school when an evil presence takes to the skies and threatens to destroy the academy.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Armed with newfound confidence, Mildred returns to Cackle's Academy, where her mother is joining the staff as the school's first nonmagical teacher.

episodes.name: The Three Impossibilities
episodes.overview: When a botched potions experiment leaves Mildred with a whole new look, can she complete three impossible challenges and reverse the spell before the sun goes down?

episodes.name: Gertrude the Great
episodes.overview: Enid's attempt to help Mildred win her first head girl challenge backfires.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday, Indigo Moon
episodes.overview: Indigo discovers that her mother has been searching for her for 30 years.

episodes.name: Enid Nightshade, Superstar
episodes.overview: When Mistress Nightshade makes a surprise visit, Enid is left in a terrible dilemma - complete her studies at Cackle’s or join the family magic show? Will Mildred’s great debate challenge help her make up her mind?

episodes.name: Maud's Magical Make-over
episodes.overview: Neglected Maud discovers Felicity uses a secret coolness potion.

episodes.name: The Crystal Lake
episodes.overview: When Mildred’s new friend Jessica lures her to the Crystal Lake, Mildred breaks all the rules to go and meet her, and she discovers that all is not what it seems!

episodes.name: Enid's Last Race
episodes.overview: Betrayed by Miss Hempnettle, will Enid’s dreams of sprint stardom at the Witch World Games qualifiers end in tatters?

episodes.name: Mildred the Detective
episodes.overview: With a magical prankster at large in Cackle’s, Ethel and Mildred are tasked with finding the culprit as their next head girl challenge. Who or what is causing the mayhem?

episodes.name: A Witch in Time
episodes.overview: Desperate to win the Head Girl Triathlon and stop her terrible future vision from coming true, Mildred embarks on a dangerous gambit to rewind time with a stolen loop spell from Mr Daisy.

episodes.name: Grounded
episodes.overview: Mildred is horrified to find her magic is broken when visiting Izzy’s farm. Izzy’s dad, Spike, sets out to help her create a grounding stone to reboot it, with more than a few stars aligning.

episodes.name: The Witching Hour (1)
episodes.overview: Mildred’s final head girl challenge has disastrous consequences for Miss Cackle and gets Mildred sent away to Wormwood Correctional School for bad witches.

episodes.name: The Witching Hour (2)
episodes.overview: When Agatha tricks most of Cackle’s into a world of magical landfill, it looks like her victims are all set to be recycled and disappear for ever at midnight, unless Mildred can save the day before the fateful hour!
